original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun gcod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / khams la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / sa la 'dod chags dang bral @149a * //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun gcod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / khams la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / sa la 'dod chags dang bral @149a * //
translated: severing the root of virtue, taking up the root of virtue, freedom from attachment to the elements and freedom from attachment to the stages.

original: pa dang / yongs su nyams pa dang / 'pho ba dang / skye ba'o //
analyzed: pa dang / yongs su nyams pa dang / 'pho ba dang / skye ba'o //
translated: the cutting off of the wholesome roots, the taking up of the wholesome roots, the detachment from the realm of desire, the detachment from the realm of form, the detachment from the formless realm, the retrogressing, the passing away, and the rebirth.

original: khams la bco brgyad de 'di lta ste /
analyzed: khams la bco brgyad de 'di lta ste /
translated: The elements are eighteen:

original: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: the eye element, the form element, the eye-consciousness element; the ear element, the sound element, the ear-consciousness element; the nose element, the smell element, the nose-consciousness element;

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: the tongue element, the taste element, and the tongue consciousness element; the body element, the tangible-object element, and the body consciousness element; the thinking-mind element, the entity element, and the thinking-mind consciousness element.

original: skye mched ni bcu gnyis te 'di lta ste /
analyzed: skye mched ni bcu gnyis te 'di lta ste /
translated: The bases are twelve:

original: mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang /
translated: the eye base, the ear base, the nose base, the tongue base, the body base, the thinking-mind base, the form base, the sound base, the smell base,

original: ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
analyzed: ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
translated: the taste base, the tangible-object base, and the entity base.

original: de la yid kyi skye mched dngos po bdun te /
analyzed: de la yid kyi skye mched dngos po bdun te /
translated: The thinking-mind base is seven entities:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: dbang po drug gi rnam shes dang yid kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: dbang po drug gi rnam shes dang yid kyi dbang po'o //
translated: the six consciousnesses and the thinking-mind faculty.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs pa'i yid kyi rnam shes dang gnyis kyi lhan cig pas yid kyi skye mched ni dngos po dgu'o //
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs pa'i yid kyi rnam shes dang gnyis kyi lhan cig pas yid kyi skye mched ni dngos po dgu'o //
translated: The mental sense-sphere is nine things, namely, the eight consciousnesses and the mental faculty, because it is associated with both the store-consciousness and the defiled mind.

original: chos bdun ni chos kyi skye mched do //
analyzed: chos bdun ni chos kyi skye mched do //
translated: The sense-sphere of factors is seven things.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par rig byed pa yin pa dang / nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par rig byed pa yin pa dang / nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa'o //
translated: feeling, perception, the formative forces dissociated from thought, non-informative form, space, the cessation due to deliberation and the cessation not due to deliberation.

original: de rnams kun du bsdu ba yang 'di bzhin te /
analyzed: de rnams kun du bsdu ba yang 'di bzhin te /
translated: The inclusion of these is as follows:

original: gzugs can gyi skye mched bcu ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: gzugs can gyi skye mched bcu ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
translated: The ten material sense-spheres are the form aggregate.

original: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam shes kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam shes kyi phung po'o //
translated: The mental sense-sphere is the consciousness aggregate.

original: chos kyi skye mched ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
translated: The sense-sphere of factors is the aggregates of feeling, perception and the formative forces.

original: khams rnams su bsdu ba yang 'di bzhin te /
analyzed: khams rnams su bsdu ba yang 'di bzhin te /
translated: The inclusion of the elements is as follows:

original: gzugs can skye mched bcu ni gzugs can khams bcu'o //
analyzed: gzugs can skye mched bcu ni gzugs can khams bcu'o //
translated: The ten material sense-spheres are the ten material elements.

original: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang yid kyi khams so //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang yid kyi khams so //
translated: The mental sense-sphere is the six consciousnesses and the mental faculty.

original: chos kyi skye mched ni chos kyi khams so //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched ni chos kyi khams so //
translated: The sense-sphere of factors is the element of factors.

original: khams bco brgyad po 'di rnams kyi nang na 'dod pa na so sor yang dag par ldan pa du zhe na /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad po 'di rnams kyi nang na 'dod pa na so sor yang dag par ldan pa du zhe na /
translated: How many of the eighteen elements are associated with the realm of desire?

original: khams thams cad nyid do //
analyzed: khams thams cad nyid do //
translated: All of the elements.

original: gzugs na so @149b sor kun du ldan pa du zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs na so @149b sor kun du ldan pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are associated with the realm of form?

original: khams de rnams la dri dang ro dang sna'i rnam shes dang lce'i rnam shes ma gtogs pa gzhan khams bcu bzhi rnams so //
analyzed: khams de rnams la dri dang ro dang sna'i rnam shes dang lce'i rnam shes ma gtogs pa gzhan khams bcu bzhi rnams so //
translated: In those elements, fourteen elements are excluded from the elements of odor, taste, olfactory consciousness, and gustatory consciousness.

original: gzugs med pa na chos kun du ldan pa du zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na chos kun du ldan pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are associated with the formless realm?

original: yid kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang gsum char zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang gsum char zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The three elements of the mental faculty, the element of mental consciousness, and the element of factors are all associated with the formless realm.

original: khams gsum na mi ldan pa du zhe na /
analyzed: khams gsum na mi ldan pa du zhe na /
translated: How many elements are not associated with the three realms?

original: gang la zag pa med pa'i yid kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang chos kyi khams so //
analyzed: gang la zag pa med pa'i yid kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang chos kyi khams so //
translated: The element of the mental faculty, the element of mental consciousness, and the element of factors that are uncontaminated.

original: khams bcu ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ste /
analyzed: khams bcu ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ste /
translated: The ten elements are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or indeterminate.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: the eye consciousness element, the ear consciousness element, the nose consciousness element, the tongue consciousness element, the body consciousness element, and the mental consciousness element.

original: yid kyi dbang po dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / chos kyi khams so //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / chos kyi khams so //
translated: The mental faculty element, the form element, the sound element, and the entity element.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i khams brgyad de /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i khams brgyad de /
translated: Eight elements are indeterminate.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: mig gi khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / dri'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / reg bya'i khams so //
analyzed: mig gi khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / dri'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / reg bya'i khams so //
translated: the eye element, the ear element, the nose element, the tongue element, the body element, the smell element, the taste element, and the tangible element.

original: yang khams la rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang khams la rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Again, the elements are twofold:

original: nang dang phyi rol lo //
analyzed: nang dang phyi rol lo //
translated: internal and external.

original: de la nang gi ni lhag dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de la nang gi ni lhag dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis so //
translated: The internal ones are the twelve that are associated with excess.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: dbang po drug gi khams dang / rnam shes drug gi khams dang / chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' zhig go //
analyzed: dbang po drug gi khams dang / rnam shes drug gi khams dang / chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' zhig go //
translated: the six elements of the sense faculties, the six elements of consciousness, and a part of the element of mental objects.

original: phyi rol gyi khams la lhag dang bcas pa'i lnga ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi khams la lhag dang bcas pa'i lnga ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The external elements are the five that are associated with excess. They are:

original: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i khams dang / chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga'o //
analyzed: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i khams dang / chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga'o //
translated: the elements of form, sound, smell, taste, and touch, and a part of the element of mental objects.

original: yang khams ni rnam pa gnyis te 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang khams ni rnam pa gnyis te 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, the elements are of two kinds:

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: those that have an object and those that do not have an object.

original: de la dmigs pa dang bcas pa ni sems kyi khams bdun no //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa dang bcas pa ni sems kyi khams bdun no //
translated: Among them, those that have an object are the seven elements of consciousness.

original: lhag ma ni dmigs pa med pa ste bcu gcig go //
analyzed: lhag ma ni dmigs pa med pa ste bcu gcig go //
translated: The remaining eleven do not have an object.

original: de nyid ni bden pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bden pa bzhi ste /
translated: They are the four noble truths.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: sdug bsngal bden pa dang / kun 'byung bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'o /
analyzed: sdug bsngal bden pa dang / kun 'byung bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'o /
translated: the truth of suffering, the truth of the origin of suffering, the truth of the cessation of suffering, and the truth of the path.

original: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni khams thams cad do //
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni khams thams cad do //
translated: Among them, the truth of suffering is all the elements.

original: kun 'byung bden ni zag bcas chos kyi khams kyi cha'o //🔽lam gyi bden pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos kyi @150a * //
analyzed: kun 'byung bden ni zag bcas chos kyi khams kyi cha'o // lam gyi bden pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos kyi @150a * //
translated: The truth of the origin is a part of the element of mental objects that is contaminated.

original: khams kyi cha 'ga'o //
analyzed: khams kyi cha 'ga'o //
translated: A part of the element of mental objects that is uncontaminated is the truth of the path.

original: 'gog pa'i bden pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' nyid do //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i bden pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' nyid do //
translated: A part of the element of mental objects that is unconditioned is the truth of cessation.

original: de nyid ni rang bzhin gsum ste /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rang bzhin gsum ste / 'di lta ste /
translated: It is also the three natures:

original: kun brtags kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhan dbang gi rang bzhin dang / yongs su grub kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: kun brtags kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhan dbang gi rang bzhin dang / yongs su grub kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: the imagined nature, the nature that is dependent on others, and the perfected nature.

original: de la khams thams cad ni kun brtags dang gzhan dbang nyid do //
analyzed: de la khams thams cad ni kun brtags dang gzhan dbang nyid do //
translated: All the elements are the imagined and the nature that is dependent on others.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' ni yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' ni yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: A part of the element of mental objects that is unconditioned is the perfected nature.

original: de nyid ni bden pa gnyis te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bden pa gnyis te / 'di lta ste /
translated: It is also the two truths:

original: kun rdzob bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: the conventional truth and the ultimate truth.

original: de la khams kun nyid ni kun rdzob bden pa'o//
analyzed: de la khams kun nyid ni kun rdzob bden pa'o//
translated: All the elements are the conventional truth.

original: 'dus ma byas chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas chos kyi khams kyi cha 'ga' ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: A part of the element of mental objects that is unconditioned is the ultimate truth.

original: 'dir khams drug po 'di ni skyes bu dang gang zag ces pa khams drug ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dir khams drug po 'di ni skyes bu dang gang zag ces pa khams drug ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The six elements are as follows:

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams so //🔽yang chos rnams mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams so // yang chos rnams mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: the earth element, the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, phenomena can be summarized as two types:

original: gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
translated: those with form and those without form.

original: de la chos gzugs can ni rnam pa gnyis te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la chos gzugs can ni rnam pa gnyis te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Those with form are of two types:

original: 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las byung ba'o //
translated: the elements and those derived from the elements.

original: chos gzugs can ma yin pa ni gnyis 'di lta ste /
analyzed: chos gzugs can ma yin pa ni gnyis 'di lta ste /
translated: Those without form are also of two types:

original: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas so //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas so //
translated: conditioned and unconditioned.

original: de la chos gzugs can ma yin pa 'dus byas ni rnam pa gsum ste /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la chos gzugs can ma yin pa 'dus byas ni rnam pa gsum ste / 'di lta ste /
translated: Among those without form, conditioned phenomena are of three types:

original: sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems dang mi ldan pa'o //🔽chos gzugs can ma yin pa 'dus ma byas ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems dang mi ldan pa'o // chos gzugs can ma yin pa 'dus ma byas ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: mind, mental factors, and phenomena not associated with mind.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: Among those without form, unconditioned phenomena are of four types:

original: nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid do //
translated: space, analytical cessation, non-analytical cessation, and the reality of phenomena.

original: des na 'dod pa'i khams thams cad phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: des na 'dod pa'i khams thams cad phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Therefore, all of the desire realm is the nature of the five aggregates.

original: gzugs khams kyang 'du shes med pa'i sems can spangs pa phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: gzugs khams kyang 'du shes med pa'i sems can spangs pa phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The form realm, excluding the beings of the sphere of no-thought, is the nature of the five aggregates.

original: 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni phung po gnyis te /
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni phung po gnyis te /
translated: The beings of the sphere of no-thought have two aggregates:

original: gzugs dang 'du byed kyi phung po tsam yin pas so //
analyzed: gzugs dang 'du byed kyi phung po tsam yin pas so //
translated: only the form aggregate and the formation aggregate.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams ni phung po bzhi'i bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams ni phung po bzhi'i bdag nyid can te /
translated: The formless realm is the nature of four aggregates.

original: de la gzugs kyi phung po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la gzugs kyi phung po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the form aggregate does not exist there.

original: pandi ta chen po @150b stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis rnam par bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa las phung po skye mched khams rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba le'u dgu pa'o /
analyzed: pandi ta chen po @150b stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis rnam par bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa las phung po skye mched khams rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba le'u dgu pa'o /
translated: The great paṇḍita Daśabalaśrībhadra composed this chapter called “The Ascertainment of the Aggregates, Bases, and Constituents” from the Ascertainment of Compounded and Uncompounded Phenomena.

original: // / snod dang sems can gyi 'jig rten gnyis dag gis skyed par byed pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: // / snod dang sems can gyi 'jig rten gnyis dag gis skyed par byed pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis te / 'di lta ste /
translated: The world of sentient beings and the world of the environment are produced by the two kinds of dependent origination.🔽What are the two kinds of dependent origination?

original: phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
translated: External dependent origination and internal dependent origination.

original: de la snod kyi 'jig rten skyed par byed pa thun mong gi las ni phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de la snod kyi 'jig rten skyed par byed pa thun mong gi las ni phyi'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
translated: External dependent origination is the production of the world of the environment by the common karma of all sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten skyed par byed pa thun mong ma yin pa las ni nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'jig rten skyed par byed pa thun mong ma yin pa las ni nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
translated: Internal dependent origination is the production of the world of sentient beings by the uncommon karma of each sentient being.

original: de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni yan lag bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni yan lag bcu gnyis te /
translated: Internal dependent origination has twelve members.

original: 'di ltar ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang /
translated: Thus, the links of ignorance, formation, consciousness, name and form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling,

original: sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
analyzed: sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
translated: craving, grasping, existence, birth, and aging and death.

original: de rnams ni yan lag bzhi nyid du 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de rnams ni yan lag bzhi nyid du 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: These are fourfold:

original: 'phen par byed pa'i yan lag dang / 'phangs pa'i yan lag dang / mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag dang / mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i yan lag go //
analyzed: 'phen par byed pa'i yan lag dang / 'phangs pa'i yan lag dang / mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag dang / mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i yan lag go //
translated: the projecting links, the projected links, the establishing links, and the established links.

original: de la 'phen par byed pa'i yan lag rnam pa gnyis te 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la 'phen par byed pa'i yan lag rnam pa gnyis te 'di lta ste /
translated: The projecting links are twofold:

original: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
translated: the link of ignorance and the link of formation.

original: 'phangs pa'i yan lag la rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'phangs pa'i yan lag la rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The five limbs of projection are as follows:

original: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag go //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag go //
translated: the consciousness limb, the name-and-form limb, the six sense bases limb, the contact limb, and the feeling limb.

original: mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag la rnam pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag la rnam pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The three limbs of actualization are as follows:

original: sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag go //
translated: the craving limb, the grasping limb, and the existence limb.

original: mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i yan lag la rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i yan lag la rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The two limbs of what is to be actualized are as follows:

original: skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
analyzed: skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
translated: the birth limb and the aging-and-death limb.

original: yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la dum bu ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la dum bu ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, this dependent origination has three sections:

original: sngon gyi dum bu dang / bar gyi dum bu dang / mtha' ma'i dum @151a * //
analyzed: sngon gyi dum bu dang / bar gyi dum bu dang / mtha' ma'i dum @151a * //
translated: the prior section, the middle section, and the final section.

original: bu'o // de la sngon gyi dum bu ni de ma thag pa'i skye ba sngon ma dang 'brel pa'i yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bu'o // de la sngon gyi dum bu ni de ma thag pa'i skye ba sngon ma dang 'brel pa'i yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The prior section is the two limbs that connect with the prior birth that immediately preceded this one, which are

original: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
translated: the ignorance limb and the formation limb.

original: bar gyi dum bu'i skye ba lta ba dang 'brel ba'i yan lag brgyad ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bar gyi dum bu'i skye ba lta ba dang 'brel ba'i yan lag brgyad ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The middle section is the eight limbs that connect with the view of this birth, which are

original: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag dang /
translated: the consciousness limb, the name-and-form limb, the six sense bases limb, the contact limb, the feeling limb, the craving limb, the grasping limb, and

original: srid pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag go //
translated: the existence limb.

original: mtha' ma'i dum bu ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang 'brel ba'i yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mtha' ma'i dum bu ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang 'brel ba'i yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The final section is the two limbs that connect with the future birth, which are

original: skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go /
analyzed: skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go /
translated: the birth limb and the aging-and-death limb.

original: yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mtha' gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mtha' gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Also, with regard to dependent arising, there are two extremes:

original: sngon gyi mtha' can dang / phyi ma'i mtha' can no //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' can dang / phyi ma'i mtha' can no //
translated: The first is related to the prior limit, and the second is related to the later limit.

original: de la sngon gyi mtha' can la gnyis ni bdag nyid de 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la sngon gyi mtha' can la gnyis ni bdag nyid de 'di lta ste /
translated: The first is twofold:

original: rgyu'i bdag nyid dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu'i bdag nyid dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: the nature of the cause and the nature of the result.

original: de la rgyu'i bdag nyid ni skye ba sngon ma dang 'brel ba'i yan lag la gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i bdag nyid ni skye ba sngon ma dang 'brel ba'i yan lag la gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The nature of the cause is related to the prior birth, and it is twofold:

original: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
translated: the member of ignorance and the member of conditioning.

original: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid la 'jug bzhin pa'i skye ba dang 'brel ba'i yan lag lnga ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid la 'jug bzhin pa'i skye ba dang 'brel ba'i yan lag lnga ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The nature of the result is related to the present birth, and it is fivefold:

original: rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba'o //
translated: the members of consciousness, name and form, the six sense bases, contact, and feeling.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' can yang gnyis kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' can yang gnyis kyi bdag nyid de /
translated: The second is related to the later limit, and it is twofold:

original: rgyu'i bdag nyid dang / 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //🔽de la rgyu'i bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: rgyu'i bdag nyid dang / 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do // de la rgyu'i bdag nyid ni /
translated: the nature of the cause and the nature of the result.

original: da lta'i skye ba dang 'brel pa'i yan lag gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: da lta'i skye ba dang 'brel pa'i yan lag gsum ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The nature of the cause is related to the present birth, and it is threefold:🔽the members of craving, grasping, and becoming.🔽The nature of the result is related to the future birth, and it is twofold:🔽the members of birth and aging and death.

original: sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'o //
translated: craving, grasping, and becoming.

original: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid de ma thag pa ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang 'brel pa'i yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid de ma thag pa ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang 'brel pa'i yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The two factors that are the effect-self are the next two factors, which are related to future birth:

original: skye ba dang / rga shi'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang / rga shi'o //
translated: birth and old age and death.

original: yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ni phung po gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ni phung po gsum ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, dependent origination has three groups:

original: nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang / las kyi phung po dang / skye ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang / las kyi phung po dang / skye ba'i phung po'o //
translated: the group of afflictions, the group of karma, and the group of birth.

original: de la nyon mongs pa'i phung po la yan lag gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa'i phung po la yan lag gsum ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Among them, the group of afflictions has three factors:

original: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag go //
translated: the factor of ignorance, the factor of craving, and the factor of grasping.

original: las kyi phung po la yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: las kyi phung po la yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The group of karma has two factors:

original: 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / srid pa'i @151b yan lag go //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / srid pa'i @151b yan lag go //
translated: the factor of karmic predispositions and the factor of becoming.

original: skye ba'i phung po la yan lag bdun ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i phung po la yan lag bdun ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The group of birth has seven factors:

original: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
translated: the member of consciousness, the member of name-and-form, the member of the six sense spheres, the member of contact, the member of feeling, the member of birth, and the member of old age and death.

original: yang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: yang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bdag nyid de /
translated: Moreover, it is the nature of the three kinds of defilement:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid dang / skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid dang / skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: the nature of the defilement of moral defilement, the nature of the defilement of action and the nature of the defilement of birth.

original: de la nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la yan lag gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la yan lag gsum ni 'di lta ste /
translated: In this respect, the three members which have the nature of the defilement of moral defilement are:

original: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i yan lag dang / sred pa'i yan lag dang / nye bar len pa'i yan lag go //
translated: the member of ignorance, the member of craving and the member of grasping.

original: las kyi nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: las kyi nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la yan lag gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The two members which have the nature of the defilement of action are:🔽the member of karmic forces and the member of becoming.

original: 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag go //
translated: the member of existence.

original: skye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la yan lag bdun ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la yan lag bdun ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The seven members that have the nature of the afflictions of birth are:

original: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
translated: the member of consciousness, the member of name-and-form, the member of the six sense spheres, the member of contact, the member of feeling, the member of birth, and the member of old age and death.

original: yang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bdag nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni gnyis kyi bdag nyid de 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bdag nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni gnyis kyi bdag nyid de 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, dependent origination, which has the nature of the three afflictions, has the nature of two:

original: rgyu'i bdag nyid dang / 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu'i bdag nyid dang / 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: the nature of cause and the nature of effect.

original: de la rgyu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la kun nas nyon mongs gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la kun nas nyon mongs gnyis ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Among them, the two afflictions that have the nature of the cause are:

original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / 'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la gcig ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / 'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid la gcig ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The afflictions are the nature of the afflictions, karma is the nature of karma, and birth is the nature of the result.

original: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //🔽yang lam gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o // yang lam gsum ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Birth is the nature of the result.

original: nyon mongs pa'i lam dang / las kyi lam dang / rnam par smin pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i lam dang / las kyi lam dang / rnam par smin pa'i lam mo //
translated: The three paths are the path of the afflictions, the path of karma, and the path of the result.

original: de la nyon mongs pa'i lam ni yan lag gsum ste /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa'i lam ni yan lag gsum ste / 'di lta ste /
translated: The path of the afflictions has three members:

original: ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa'o //
translated: ignorance, craving, and grasping.

original: las kyi lam la yan lag gnyis te 'di yin te /
analyzed: las kyi lam la yan lag gnyis te 'di yin te /
translated: The path of karma has two members:

original: 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi yan lag dang / srid pa'i yan lag go //
translated: the member of karmic formation and the member of existence.

original: rnam par smin pa'i lam la yan lag bdun ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i lam la yan lag bdun ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The path of the result has seven members:

original: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / @152a * //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i yan lag dang / @152a * //
translated: the member of consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi yan lag dang / skye mched drug gi yan lag dang / reg pa'i yan lag dang / tshor ba'i yan lag dang / skye ba'i yan lag dang / rga shi'i yan lag go //
translated: the member of name-and-form, the member of the six sense spheres, the member of contact, the member of feeling, the member of birth, and the member of old age and death.

original: yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid de /
translated: Dependent origination is also described as having twelve aspects:

original: 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di yin te /
translated: the aspect of ignorance, the aspect of karmic predispositions, the aspect of consciousness, the aspect of name-and-form, the aspect of the six sense spheres, the aspect of contact, the aspect of feeling, the aspect of craving, the aspect of grasping, the aspect of becoming, the aspect of birth, and the aspect of old age and death.

original: gang de ma thag pa'i 'das pa'i skye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas skabs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang de ma thag pa'i 'das pa'i skye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas skabs ni ma yin no //
translated: The aspect of ignorance is the period of all the mental afflictions that immediately precede the previous birth.

original: gang de ma thag pa'i 'das pa'i skye ba'i yang srid len byed kyi las mtha' dag gi gnas skabs de ni 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: gang de ma thag pa'i 'das pa'i skye ba'i yang srid len byed kyi las mtha' dag gi gnas skabs de ni 'du byed kyi yan lag go //
translated: The aspect of karmic predispositions is the period of all the karmic actions that immediately precede the previous birth and that lead to the appropriation of a new existence.

original: ma'i lto bar skye ba nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i dus kyi phung po lnga'i gnas skabs de ni rnam par shes pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: ma'i lto bar skye ba nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i dus kyi phung po lnga'i gnas skabs de ni rnam par shes pa'i yan lag go //
translated: The aspect of consciousness is the period of the five aggregates at the moment of conception in the mother’s womb.

original: nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i dus phan chad nas skye mched drug ma dod pa'i bar gyi gnas skabs de ni ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i dus phan chad nas skye mched drug ma dod pa'i bar gyi gnas skabs de ni ming dang gzugs so //
translated: The aspect of name-and-form is the period from the moment of conception until the six sense faculties are fully developed.

original: de'i rjes su skye mched drug rdzogs te /
analyzed: de'i rjes su skye mched drug rdzogs te /
translated: Then, the six sense spheres are complete.

original: ci srid du dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams 'tshogs par ma gyur pa'i bar gyi gnas skabs de ni skye mched drug gi yan lag go //
analyzed: ci srid du dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams 'tshogs par ma gyur pa'i bar gyi gnas skabs de ni skye mched drug gi yan lag go //
translated: The period during which the sense faculty, the object, and the consciousness have not yet come together is the stage of the six sense spheres.

original: dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams phrad nas 'tshogs pa gsum yongs su gcod par mi nus pa'i gnas skabs de ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams phrad nas 'tshogs pa gsum yongs su gcod par mi nus pa'i gnas skabs de ni reg pa'o //
translated: The period during which the sense faculty, the object, and the consciousness have come together, but the three are still unable to determine the object is contact.

original: tshor ba gsum yongs su bcad nas ci srid du 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags ma gyur pa de'i gnas skabs ni tshor ba'i yan lag go //
analyzed: tshor ba gsum yongs su bcad nas ci srid du 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags ma gyur pa de'i gnas skabs ni tshor ba'i yan lag go //
translated: The period during which the three kinds of feeling are determined, but sexual passion has not yet arisen, is the stage of feeling.

original: 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kun du spyod pa'i gnas skabs de ni sred pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kun du spyod pa'i gnas skabs de ni sred pa'i yan lag go //
translated: The period during which sexual passion is indulged in is the stage of craving.

original: yul gang gi gnas skabs thob pa'i don du 'tshol ba la zhugs nas thams cad du rgyug pa'i gnas skabs de ni nye bar len pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: yul gang gi gnas skabs thob pa'i don du 'tshol ba la zhugs nas thams cad du rgyug pa'i gnas skabs de ni nye bar len pa'i yan lag go //
translated: The period during which one pursues the object in order to obtain it and runs around everywhere is the stage of grasping.

original: yul gang thob pa'i don kun du rgyug pas yang srid len byed kyi las nye bar sogs pa'i gnas skabs de srid pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: yul gang thob pa'i don kun du rgyug pas yang srid len byed kyi las nye bar sogs pa'i gnas skabs de srid pa'i yan lag go //
translated: The state of accumulating karma that leads to rebirth, because it pursues all the objects that are obtained, is the link of becoming.

original: skye ba la 'di nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de nyid kyi bar med pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i gnas skabs de ni skye ba'i yan lag go //
analyzed: skye ba la 'di nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de nyid kyi bar med pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i gnas skabs de ni skye ba'i yan lag go //
translated: The state of consciousness in this very birth, which is immediately followed by the state of birth in the future, is the link of birth.

original: skye ba 'di nyid kyi ming dang gzugs skye mched drug tshor ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de nyid kyi bar med pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba ni rga shi'i yan lag go //
analyzed: skye ba 'di nyid kyi ming dang gzugs skye mched drug tshor ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de nyid kyi bar med pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba ni rga shi'i yan lag go //
translated: The state of name and form, six sense bases, and feeling in this very birth, which is immediately followed by the state of birth in the future, is the link of aging and death.

original: yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni phan tshun rgyu yin te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni phan tshun rgyu yin te /🔽'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, dependent origination is a mutual cause.

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen las 'du byed dang / 'du byed @152b kyi rkyen las rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen las ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen las skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen las reg pa dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen las 'du byed dang / 'du byed @152b kyi rkyen las rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen las ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen las skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen las reg pa dang /
translated: The condition of ignorance gives rise to formation, the condition of formation gives rise to consciousness, the condition of consciousness gives rise to name and form, the condition of name and form gives rise to the six sense sources, the condition of the six sense sources gives rise to contact,

original: reg pa'i rkyen las tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen las sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen las nye bar len pa dang / nye bar len pa'i rkyen las srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen las skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen las rga shi'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i rkyen las tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen las sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen las nye bar len pa dang / nye bar len pa'i rkyen las srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen las skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen las rga shi'o //
translated: the condition of contact gives rise to feeling, the condition of feeling gives rise to craving, the condition of craving gives rise to grasping, the condition of grasping gives rise to becoming, the condition of becoming gives rise to birth, and the condition of birth gives rise to old age and death.

original: des na de bzhin du skye ba'i rkyen las rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod de /
analyzed: des na de bzhin du skye ba'i rkyen las rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod de /
translated: Thus, the condition of birth gives rise to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, despair, and distress.

original: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig kun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig kun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: Thus, the entire great mass of suffering comes to be. This is the concordant.

original: 'ba' zhig ces pa ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i zhes pa'o //🔽rjes su mi mthun pa ni ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag / skye mched drug 'gags pas reg
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ces pa ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i zhes pa'o // rjes su mi mthun pa ni ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag / skye mched drug 'gags pas reg
translated: The word “entire” means that it is free from a self and so on that are imagined by others.

original: pa 'gag / reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag / tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag / sred pa 'gags pas nye bar len pa 'gag / nye bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag / srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag / skye ba 'gags pas
analyzed: pa 'gag / reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag / tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag / sred pa 'gags pas nye bar len pa 'gag / nye bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag / srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag / skye ba 'gags pas
translated: The discordant is the cessation of ignorance, the cessation of formations, the cessation of consciousness, the cessation of name and form, the cessation of the six sense sources, the cessation of contact, the cessation of feeling, the cessation of craving, the cessation of grasping, the cessation of becoming, the cessation of birth, the cessation of old age and death, the cessation of sorrow, lamentation, pain,🔽grief, and distress.

original: rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, dejection, and anguish cease.

original: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the great mass of nothing but suffering ceases.

original: 'ba' zhig ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i zhes pa'o //
translated: “Nothing but” means being free from a self and so on that are imagined by others.

original: yang de la ma rig pa ni 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang de la ma rig pa ni 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, ignorance is present as the twofold result:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: dmigs pa sems can rnams kun du rmongs par byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa sems can rnams kun du rmongs par byed do //
translated: it causes delusion with regard to sentient beings, the objects of perception;

original: 'du byed mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
translated: and it provides the cause for the full development of formations.

original: 'du byed kyang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: Formations are present as the twofold result:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par @153a * //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par @153a * //
translated: they bring about the future ripening of consciousness; and they provide the cause for the full development of consciousness.

original: rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
translated: It is the cause for the completion of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Consciousness also has two effects that are present as its results:🔽Name-and-form also has two effects that are present as its results:

original: srid pa nyid mtshams sbyor ba skyed par byed pa dang / ming dang gzugs mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang smin par byed ming dang gzugs kyang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: srid pa nyid mtshams sbyor ba skyed par byed pa dang / ming dang gzugs mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang smin par byed ming dang gzugs kyang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Name-and-form is the cause for the production of the linking of existence and for the completion of name-and-form.🔽The six sense fields also have two effects that are present as its results:

original: phan tshun nye bar bstan par yang byed pa dang / skye mched drug mngon par sgrub pa'i don du rgyu ster ro //
analyzed: phan tshun nye bar bstan par yang byed pa dang / skye mched drug mngon par sgrub pa'i don du rgyu ster ro //
translated: The six sense fields are the cause for the mutual manifestation of name-and-form and for the establishment of the six sense fields.🔽The six sense fields are the cause for the establishment of contact.

original: skye mched drug kyang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: skye mched drug kyang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Contact also has two effects that are present as its results:

original: yul rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / reg pa mngon par sgrub pa'i don du rgyu yang ster ro //
analyzed: yul rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / reg pa mngon par sgrub pa'i don du rgyu yang ster ro //
translated: Contact is the cause for the manifestation of the object and for the establishment of contact.

original: reg pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: reg pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: It causes the object to be present and it causes the contact to be present.

original: dmigs pa dang reg par byed pa dang / tshor ba mngon par rdzogs pa'i ched du rgyu yang ster ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang reg par byed pa dang / tshor ba mngon par rdzogs pa'i ched du rgyu yang ster ro //
translated: It also provides the cause for the completion of feeling.

original: tshor ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: tshor ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Feeling also has two effects:🔽It causes the experience of what is desired, what is not desired, and the opposite of both.

original: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dang gnyis ka bzlog pa nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / sred pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i don du rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dang gnyis ka bzlog pa nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / sred pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i don du rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
translated: It also provides the cause for the completion of craving.

original: sred pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: sred pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Craving also has two effects:🔽It causes attachment to the object that is covered.

original: kun nas gos par bya ba'i dngos po la kun du chags par byed pa dang / nyer len mngon par rdzogs pa'i don du rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: kun nas gos par bya ba'i dngos po la kun du chags par byed pa dang / nyer len mngon par rdzogs pa'i don du rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
translated: It also provides the cause for the completion of grasping.

original: nye bar len pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: nye bar len pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Appropriation also has two kinds of effects that occur separately:

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang sdom par byed pa dang / srid pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang sdom par byed pa dang / srid pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
translated: It causes the production of the afflictions and the production of the aggregates.

original: srid pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: srid pa yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Existence also has two kinds of effects that occur separately:

original: srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhan dang so sor nye bar gnas par byed pa dang / skye ba mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin no //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhan dang so sor nye bar gnas par byed pa dang / skye ba mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin no //
translated: It causes the production of the other realms of existence and the production of birth.

original: skye ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: skye ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / 'di lta ste /
translated: Birth also has two kinds of effects that occur separately:

original: phung po phye ba byed pa dang / rga ba mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: phung po phye ba byed pa dang / rga ba mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyu yang sbyin par byed do //
translated: It causes the production of the differentiation of the aggregates and the production of aging.

original: rga ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: rga ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /🔽'di lta ste /
translated: Aging also has two kinds of effects that occur separately:🔽It causes the production of the transformation of the aggregates and the production of death.

original: dbang po yang rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa @153b dang / 'chi ba kun du 'dzin pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i don du rgyu yang ster bar byed do //
analyzed: dbang po yang rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa @153b dang / 'chi ba kun du 'dzin pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i don du rgyu yang ster bar byed do //
translated: It also causes the faculties to change and it causes the cause of death to be fully completed.

original: 'chi ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'chi ba yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: Death also abides as a result in two ways.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: 'du byed rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang / yongs su mi shes pa nye bar 'chad par mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang / yongs su mi shes pa nye bar 'chad par mi byed pa'o //
translated: it destroys the formative forces and it does not bring about the cessation of nescience.

original: de la dmigs la sems can rnams rmongs par byed do zhes pa ni yul gtsang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan mar bzung nas kun du chags par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs la sems can rnams rmongs par byed do zhes pa ni yul gtsang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan mar bzung nas kun du chags par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes beings to be confused in regard to that which is to be known refers to the fact that it causes attachment through apprehending the signs of purity etc.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub par byed ces pa ni 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub par byed ces pa ni 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: It establishes the future result of evolution refers to the fact that it brings about the result, whether it be agreeable or disagreeable.

original: srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba zhes pa ni skye ba'i srid pa rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba zhes pa ni skye ba'i srid pa rdzogs par byed do //
translated: It causes the linking with existence refers to the fact that it brings about rebirth existence.

original: ming zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ming zhes pa ni /
translated: Name refers to the four name aggregates that are associated with the storeconsciousness.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
translated: The aggregates are the form aggregate, the feeling aggregate, the perception aggregate, the formations aggregate, and the consciousness aggregate.

original: gzugs zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //🔽de rnams phan tshun nye bar bsten par byed ces pa ni /
analyzed: gzugs zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'o // de rnams phan tshun nye bar bsten par byed ces pa ni /
translated: The term “form” refers to the form aggregate.🔽“They mutually support each other” means

original: phan tshun rjes su 'gro bas mthun par 'dzin pa'o//
analyzed: phan tshun rjes su 'gro bas mthun par 'dzin pa'o//
translated: that they mutually follow each other and hold each other in place.

original: yul rnam par byed ces pa ni /
analyzed: yul rnam par byed ces pa ni /
translated: “They differentiate objects” means

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnam par tha dad par ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnam par tha dad par ro //
translated: that they differentiate objects such as form.🔽“They contact their objects” means

original: dmigs pa reg par byed ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par reg pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa reg par byed ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par reg pa'o //
translated: that they contact their objects such as form.

original: 'dod pa mi 'dod pa gnyi ga bzlog pa nyams su myong ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa mi 'dod pa gnyi ga bzlog pa nyams su myong ba zhes pa ni /
translated: “They experience the reversal of both the desirable and the undesirable” means

original: 'dod pa ni bde ba'o mi 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni bde ba'o mi 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: that the desirable is pleasure and the undesirable is pain.

original: gnyi ga bzlog ces pa ni sdug bsngal ma yin bde ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga bzlog ces pa ni sdug bsngal ma yin bde ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: “The reversal of both” means that which is neither pain nor pleasure.

original: de rnams kyi nyams myong ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi nyams myong ni tshor ba'o //
translated: “Their experience” means feeling.

original: kun nas gos par bya ba'i dngos po la kun du chags pa zhes pa ni kun nas chags par bya ba'i yul la kun du zhen pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas gos par bya ba'i dngos po la kun du chags pa zhes pa ni kun nas chags par bya ba'i yul la kun du zhen pa'o //
translated: “Attachment to the object of complete entanglement” means attachment to the object of complete passion.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang sdom par zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang sdom par zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba'o //
translated: “Affliction and bondage” means the bondage of the affliction of karma and birth.

original: srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhan nye bar gnas pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhan nye bar gnas pa zhes pa ni /
translated: “The other migrations of existence are present” means

original: bar mtshams med par skye ba'i 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i 'gro ba nye bar 'tshogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bar mtshams med par skye ba'i 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i 'gro ba nye bar 'tshogs par byed pa'o //
translated: that the assembly of the desired and undesired migrations is produced without interval.

original: phung po phye ba byed pa zhes pa ni bar med par skye ba'i srid pa la phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: phung po phye ba byed pa zhes pa ni bar med par skye ba'i srid pa la phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba'o //
translated: “The aggregates are divided” means that the aggregates are connected to the existence produced without interval.

original: dbang po rnam par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni gnas pa gzhan du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnam par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni gnas pa gzhan du gyur pa'o //
translated: “The faculties are transformed” means that the basis is transformed.

original: 'du byed rnam par 'joms pa zhes pa ni phung po rnam par 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par 'joms pa zhes pa ni phung po rnam par 'jig pa'o //
translated: “The conditioning forces are destroyed” means that the aggregates are destroyed.

original: yongs su mi shes pa rgyun mi gcod pa zhes pa ni kun du rmongs pa ma nyams @154a * //
analyzed: yongs su mi shes pa rgyun mi gcod pa zhes pa ni kun du rmongs pa ma nyams @154a * //
translated: The phrase “the continuity of complete non-knowledge is not severed” means that the delusion is not diminished.

original: pa'o // gzhan thams cad ni go sla'o //
analyzed: pa'o // gzhan thams cad ni go sla'o //
translated: All the other terms are easy to understand.

original: de la ma rig pa'i rkyen las 'du byed ces pa ni rkyen ma rig pa las 'du byed rnams kyi nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la ma rig pa'i rkyen las 'du byed ces pa ni rkyen ma rig pa las 'du byed rnams kyi nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: In this regard, the phrase “the formations have ignorance as their condition” means that the formations are not severed and are presented as having ignorance as their condition.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen las rnam par shes pa zhes pa ni rkyen 'du byed las rnam par shes pa nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen las rnam par shes pa zhes pa ni rkyen 'du byed las rnam par shes pa nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “consciousness has formations as its condition” means that consciousness is not severed and is presented as having formations as its condition.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen las ming dang gzugs zhes pa ni rkyen rnam par shes pa las ming dang gzugs nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen las ming dang gzugs zhes pa ni rkyen rnam par shes pa las ming dang gzugs nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “name-and-form has consciousness as its condition” means that name-and-form is not severed and is presented as having consciousness as its condition.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen las skye mched drug ces pa ni rkyen ming dang gzugs las skye mched drug nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen las skye mched drug ces pa ni rkyen ming dang gzugs las skye mched drug nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “the six sense bases have name-and-form as their condition” means that the six sense bases are not severed and are presented as having name-and-form as their condition.

original: skye mched drug gi rkyen las reg pa zhes pa ni rkyen skye mched drug las reg pa nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi rkyen las reg pa zhes pa ni rkyen skye mched drug las reg pa nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The condition of the six sense-spheres is contact.

original: reg pa'i rkyen las tshor ba zhes pa ni /🔽rkyen reg pa las tshor ba nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i rkyen las tshor ba zhes pa ni / rkyen reg pa las tshor ba nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The condition of contact is feeling.🔽The condition of feeling is craving.🔽The condition of craving is grasping.🔽The condition of grasping is existence.

original: tshor ba'i rkyen las sred pa zhes pa ni rkyen tshor ba las sred pa nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen las sred pa zhes pa ni rkyen tshor ba las sred pa nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The condition of existence is birth.🔽The condition of birth is old age and death.🔽The condition of old age and death is suffering.🔽The condition of suffering is the great mass of suffering.

original: sred pa'i rkyen las nye bar len pa zhes pa ni rkyen sred pa las nye bar len pa nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa'o //

analyzed: de la 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu'i rkyen ma rig pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i rkyen no //
translated: In this regard, the causal condition of the formative forces is ignorance. This is the condition of ignorance.

analyzed: de rnams kyi ngo bo ni ma rig pa'i rkyen las so //
translated: The essence of these is from the condition of ignorance.

analyzed: de yang 'du byed rnams kyi nye bar mi chad pa ni rgyun rnam par mi chad pa dang / nye bar bstan pa ni rjes su mthun pas 'dzin pa la brjod do //
translated: Moreover, the non-termination of the formative forces is the non-termination of the continuum, and the revelation is described as the grasping of that which is in conformity with it.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen 'du byed gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi rkyen no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen 'du byed gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi rkyen no //

original: de'i ngo bo ni 'du byed kyi rkyen las so //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni 'du byed kyi rkyen las so //
translated: The essence of these is from the condition of the formative forces.

original: de yang nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa zhes pa ni sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang nye bar mi chad pa dang nye bar bstan pa zhes pa ni sngon bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, the non-termination and the revelation of these is as before.

original: de ltar thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //

original: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces pa ni rkyen ma rig pa dngos po med pa las 'du byed rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //🔽'du byed 'gags pas @154b rnam par shes pa 'gag ces pa ni /

translated: The statement “through the cessation of ignorance, formations cease” does not indicate the pacification and the teaching of formations from the non-entityness of the condition ignorance.

original: rkyen 'du byed ngo bo med pa las rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen 'du byed ngo bo med pa las rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The statement “through the cessation of formations, consciousness ceases” does not indicate the pacification of consciousness from the non-entityness of the condition formations.

original: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag ces pa ni rkyen rnam par shes pa ngo bo med pa las ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag ces pa ni rkyen rnam par shes pa ngo bo med pa las ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The statement “through the cessation of consciousness, name and form cease” does not indicate the pacification of name and form from the non-entityness of the condition consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag ces pa ni rkyen ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa las skye mched drug gi nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag ces pa ni rkyen ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa las skye mched drug gi nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The statement “through the cessation of name and form, the six sense spheres cease” does not indicate the pacification of the six sense spheres from the non-entityness of the condition name and form.

original: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen skye mched drug dngos po med pa las reg pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar mi bstan pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen skye mched drug dngos po med pa las reg pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar mi bstan pa'o //
translated: The statement “the cessation of the six sense spheres is the cessation of contact” means that contact is completely stilled and not revealed from the non-entityness of the condition, the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag ces pa ni rkyen reg pa dngos po med pa las tshor ba nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag ces pa ni rkyen reg pa dngos po med pa las tshor ba nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The statement “the cessation of contact is the cessation of feeling” means that feeling is not revealed from the non-entityness of the condition, contact.

original: tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen tshor ba dngos po med pa las sred pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o//🔽srid pa 'gags pas nye bar len pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen sred pa dngos po med pa las nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen tshor ba dngos po med pa las sred pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o// srid pa 'gags pas nye bar len pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen sred pa dngos po med pa las nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The statement “the cessation of feeling is the cessation of craving” means that craving is completely stilled and not revealed from the non-entityness of the condition, feeling.🔽The statement “the cessation of becoming is the cessation of appropriation” means that appropriation is completely stilled and not revealed from the non-entityness of the condition, becoming.

original: nye bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen nye bar len pa dngos po med pa las srid pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar mi bstan pa'o//
analyzed: nye bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag ces pa ni rkyen nye bar len pa dngos po med pa las srid pa nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar mi bstan pa'o//
translated: The statement “the cessation of appropriation is the cessation of becoming” means that becoming is completely stilled and not revealed from the non-entityness of the condition, appropriation.

original: srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag ces pa ni rkyen srid pa dngos po med pa las skye ba nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag ces pa ni rkyen srid pa dngos po med pa las skye ba nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The statement “With the cessation of existence, birth ceases” does not teach that birth is completely stilled from the non-entity that is the condition of existence.

original: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag ces pa ni rkyen skye ba dngos po med pa las rga shi nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag ces pa ni rkyen skye ba dngos po med pa las rga shi nye bar zhi ba dang nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'o zhes so //
translated: The statement “With the cessation of birth, aging and death cease” does not teach that aging and death are completely stilled from the non-entity that is the condition of birth.

analyzed: lus kyi dang / ngag gi dang / yid kyi'o //

analyzed: de la lus kyi las rnam pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /

analyzed: srog gcod pa las log pa dang / ma byin par len pa las log pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa las log pa'o //

original: ngag gi la rnam pa bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ngag gi la rnam pa bzhi ni 'di lta ste /

analyzed: brdzun smra ba las ldog pa dang / dbyen smra ba las ldog pa dang / tshig rtsub las ldog pa dang / tshig kyal pa las ldog pa'o //
translated: refraining from lying, refraining from malicious speech, refraining from harsh speech, and refraining from frivolous speech.

original: yid kyi dge ba'i las la rnam pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yid kyi dge ba'i las la rnam pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /

translated: Refraining from the proscribed misdeeds is also virtuous.

original: yang las rnam pa gsum ste /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang las rnam pa gsum ste / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: mthong ba'i chos la myong bar bya ba dang / skyes nas myong bar bya ba @155b dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar bya ba yin pa'o //
translated: that which is to be experienced in this life, that which is to be experienced after taking rebirth, and that which is to be experienced in a third life or later.

original: de la skyes nas myong bar bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la skyes nas myong bar bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te 'di lta ste /

original: mtshams med pa'i las dang / nye ba'i mtshams med pa'i las so //
analyzed: mtshams med pa'i las dang / nye ba'i mtshams med pa'i las so //
translated: that which is to be experienced after taking rebirth in the hells and that which is to be experienced after taking rebirth in the desire realm.

original: de la mtshams med pa'i las rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la mtshams med pa'i las rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste /
translated: That which is to be experienced in the hells is of five types:

original: ma gsod pa dang / pha gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sdang ba'i sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / dge 'dun 'byed pa'o //

translated: killing one’s mother, killing one’s father, killing an arhat, causing blood to flow from the body of a tathāgata with an evil mind, and causing a schism in the saṅgha.

analyzed: de la dge 'dun 'byed pa la rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste /

original: 'khor lo 'byed pa dang / las 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'byed pa dang / las 'byed pa'o //
translated: that which is to be experienced after taking rebirth in the desire realm and that which is to be experienced after taking rebirth in the form and formless realms.

original: de la 'khor lo 'byed pa'i dge 'dun 'byed pa po ni /
analyzed: de la 'khor lo 'byed pa'i dge 'dun 'byed pa po ni /
translated: That which is to be experienced after taking rebirth in the desire realm is of five types:

original: dge slong kho na ste lta ba la spyod pa nyid yin gyi sred pa la spyod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dge slong kho na ste lta ba la spyod pa nyid yin gyi sred pa la spyod pa ni ma yin no //

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba ma yin no //

original: dge slong ma la sogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dge slong ma la sogs pa ma yin no //

analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling nyid yin pa /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i dus ma yin pa nyid do //
