translated: It is not that which increases, nor that which decreases. It is not that which is in training, nor that which is beyond training. It is not that which is to be abandoned by insight,

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //🔽de @182a * //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o // de @182a * //
translated: nor that which is to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: bzhin du'ang yang gzugs kyi phung po shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhin du'ang yang gzugs kyi phung po shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand the aggregate of form.

original: tshor ba ni mtshan nyid kyis gcig ste /
analyzed: tshor ba ni mtshan nyid kyis gcig ste /
translated: Feeling is one in its intrinsic nature,

original: 'di ltar / gang sems kyi dmigs pa nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang sems kyi dmigs pa nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: namely, that which experiences the object-field of the mind.

original: dngos po'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: dngos po'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis ni 'di ltar /
translated: It is twofold according to the mode of existence,

original: lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'o //
analyzed: lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'o //
translated: namely, that which arises from the material sense-faculties and that which arises from thought.

original: rang bzhin gyi dbang gis rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi dbang gis rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
translated: It is threefold according to its intrinsic nature,

original: bde ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o //
translated: namely, pleasant, unpleasant, neither unpleasant nor pleasant.

original: chos kyi dbang gis rnam pa bzhi ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: chos kyi dbang gis rnam pa bzhi ni 'di ltar /
translated: It is fourfold according to the dharmas,

original: dge ba'i tshor ba dang / mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i tshor ba dang / bya ba'i tshor ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i tshor ba dang / mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i tshor ba dang / bya ba'i tshor ba'o //
translated: pleasant feeling, unpleasant feeling, neither pleasant nor unpleasant feeling, feeling that is the result of evolution, feeling that is to be abandoned, feeling that is not to be abandoned, and feeling that is neither to be abandoned nor not to be abandoned.

original: dbang po'i dbang gis rnam pa lnga ni 'di ltar ;
analyzed: dbang po'i dbang gis rnam pa lnga ni 'di ltar ;
translated: Feeling is fivefold from the point of view of the controlling faculties.

original: bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of pleasure, the faculty of pain, the faculty of mental pleasure, the faculty of mental displeasure, and the faculty of indifference.

original: dkar nag gi dbang gis rnam pa drug ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: dkar nag gi dbang gis rnam pa drug ni 'di ltar /
translated: Feeling is sixfold from the point of view of the distinction between good and bad.

original: zang zing dang bcas pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / zang zing med pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / zang zing dang bcas pa'i bde ba'i tshor ba dang / zang zing med pa'i bde ba'i tshor ba dang / zang zing ldan pa bde min sdug min tshor ba dang /🔽zang zing med pa bde min sdug min tshor ba'o //
analyzed: zang zing dang bcas pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / zang zing med pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / zang zing dang bcas pa'i bde ba'i tshor ba dang / zang zing med pa'i bde ba'i tshor ba dang / zang zing ldan pa bde min sdug min tshor ba dang / zang zing med pa bde min sdug min tshor ba'o //
translated: Pleasant feeling associated with the realm of desire, unpleasant feeling associated with the realm of desire, pleasant feeling associated with the realm of fine-materiality, unpleasant feeling associated with the realm of fine-materiality, pleasant feeling associated with the realm of immateriality, unpleasant feeling associated with the realm of immateriality.

original: sgo'i dbang po rnam pa bdun ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: sgo'i dbang po rnam pa bdun ni 'di ltar /
translated: Feeling is sevenfold from the point of view of the doors.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa dang /
translated: The feeling that arises from the contact of the eye, the feeling that arises from the contact of the ear, the feeling that arises from the contact of the nose, the feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the contact of the body,

original: yid kyi tshor ba phrang pa las skyes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi tshor ba phrang pa las skyes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'o //
translated: the feeling that arises from the contact of the mental faculty, and the feeling that arises from the contact of the element of consciousness.

original: rgyas par ni tshor ba brgya dang brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyas par ni tshor ba brgya dang brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: In detail, there are one hundred and eight feelings.

original: 'di ltar / khyim gyi re ba la brten pa'i yid bde ba drug dang / khyim gyi re ba la brten pa'i yid mi bde ba drug dang / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa'i yid bde ba drug dang / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa'i yid mi bde ba drug dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar / khyim gyi re ba la brten pa'i yid bde ba drug dang / khyim gyi re ba la brten pa'i yid mi bde ba drug dang / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa'i yid bde ba drug dang / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa'i yid mi bde ba drug dang /
translated: Thus, there are six types of mental satisfaction based on the hope for a household, six types of mental dissatisfaction based on the hope for a household, six types of mental satisfaction based on renunciation, and six types of mental dissatisfaction based on renunciation.

original: khrims kyi re ba la brten pa'i btang snyoms kyi drug dang / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa'i btang snyoms kyi drug go //
analyzed: khrims kyi re ba la brten pa'i btang snyoms kyi drug dang / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa'i btang snyoms kyi drug go //
translated: six types of equanimity based on the hope for the Dharma, and six types of equanimity based on renunciation.

original: 'di ltar 'di dus gsum la tshor ba drug tshan drug ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di dus gsum la tshor ba drug tshan drug ste /
translated: Thus, in the three times, there are six sets of six feelings.

original: tshor ba brgya dang brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba brgya dang brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: There are one hundred and eight feelings.

original: 'di ni tshor ba'i phung po zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'di ni tshor ba'i phung po zhes brjod do //
translated: This is called the aggregate of feeling.

original: 'du shes ni mtshan nyid kyis gcig ste /
analyzed: 'du shes ni mtshan nyid kyis gcig ste /
translated: Perception is the same in terms of its characteristics.🔽It is said:

original: 'di ltar / gang sems kyis dmigs @182b pa la 'du shes pa ni 'du shes so //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang sems kyis dmigs @182b pa la 'du shes pa ni 'du shes so //
translated: Perception is the mind’s perception of an object.

original: dkar nag gi dbang gis 'du shes rnam pa gnyis ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: dkar nag gi dbang gis 'du shes rnam pa gnyis ni 'di ltar /
translated: There are two types of perception based on good and bad:

original: phyin ci log dang / phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log dang / phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: perception that is mistaken and perception that is not mistaken.

original: mi dge ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
translated: There are three types based on nonvirtue:

original: 'dod pa'i 'du shes dang / gnod pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'du shes dang / gnod pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes so //
translated: perception of desire, perception of malice, and perception of violence.

original: dge ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: dge ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
translated: There are three types based on virtue:

original: nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang / mi gnod pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes so //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang / mi gnod pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes so //
translated: the notion of deliverance, the notion of non-violence, and the notion of non-injury.

original: bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pa'i sgo nas bzhi ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pa'i sgo nas bzhi ni 'di ltar /
translated: Four notions are due to the complete ignorance of the self-nature of the self:

original: mi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal la bde ba'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes so //
analyzed: mi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal la bde ba'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes so //
translated: the notion of the pleasant with regard to the unpleasant, the notion of the pleasant with regard to suffering, the notion of permanence with regard to the impermanent, and the notion of the self with regard to non-self.

original: bdag gi dngos po yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas bzhi ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas bzhi ni 'di ltar /
translated: Four notions are due to the complete knowledge of the self-nature of the self:

original: mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes so //
analyzed: mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes so //
translated: the notion of the unpleasant, the notion of suffering, the notion of impermanence, and the notion of non-self.

original: 'dul ba'i dbang gis rnam pa lnga ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: 'dul ba'i dbang gis rnam pa lnga ni 'di ltar /
translated: Five notions are due to the power of discipline:

original: rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar 'du shes pa dang / rung ba la mi rung bar 'du shes pa dang / rung ba ma yin pa la rung ba ma yin par shes pa dang / rung ba la rung bar shes pa dang / rung ba ma yin pa la yid gnyis kyis 'du shes dang /🔽rung ba la yid gnyis kyis 'du shes so //
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar 'du shes pa dang / rung ba la mi rung bar 'du shes pa dang / rung ba ma yin pa la rung ba ma yin par shes pa dang / rung ba la rung bar shes pa dang / rung ba ma yin pa la yid gnyis kyis 'du shes dang / rung ba la yid gnyis kyis 'du shes so //
translated: and the sixth is to perceive what is proper with doubt.

original: dmigs pa'i dbang gis drug ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i dbang gis drug ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The six are due to the power of the object,

original: gzugs kyi 'du shes dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang / dri'i 'du shes dang / ri'i 'du shes dang / reg bya'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi 'du shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'du shes dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang / dri'i 'du shes dang / ri'i 'du shes dang / reg bya'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi 'du shes so //
translated: namely, the perception of form, the perception of sound, the perception of smell, the perception of taste, the perception of touch, and the perception of dharmas.🔽The seven are due to the power of the realm,

original: khams kyi dbang gis rnam pa bdun ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: khams kyi dbang gis rnam pa bdun ni 'di ltar /
translated: namely,

original: mig gi khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes dang / rna ba'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes dang / sna'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / lce'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang /
analyzed: mig gi khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes dang / rna ba'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes dang / sna'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / lce'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang /
translated: The discernment that arises from the eye element coming together with contact, the discernment that arises from the ear element coming together with contact, the discernment that arises from the nose element coming together with contact, the discernment that arises from the tongue element coming together with contact,

original: lus kyi khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / yid kyi khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / yid kyi khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'o //
translated: the discernment that arises from the body element coming together with contact, the discernment that arises from the mind element coming together with contact, and the discernment that arises from the consciousness element coming together with contact.

original: gang 'di lta bu'i 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi de kho na nyid de /
analyzed: gang 'di lta bu'i 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi de kho na nyid de /
translated: This kind of discernment is the reality of discernment.

original: 'du shes kyi phung po zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po zhes brjod do //
translated: It is called the aggregate of discernment.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po mang ste 'di ltar /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po mang ste 'di ltar /
translated: There are many aggregates of formation, such as:

original: reg pa dang / sems pa dang / rnam rtog dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / brtson @183a * //
analyzed: reg pa dang / sems pa dang / rnam rtog dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / brtson @183a * //
translated: contact, intention, conceptualization, analysis, joy, faith, effort,

original: 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / srog gi dbang po dang / sdom pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang pa dang / ma rmongs pa dang / ngo tsha ba dang / khrel yod pa dang /
analyzed: 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / srog gi dbang po dang / sdom pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang pa dang / ma rmongs pa dang / ngo tsha ba dang / khrel yod pa dang /
translated: nonattachment,🔽nonhatred,🔽nondelusion,🔽shame,🔽embarrassment,🔽pliancy,🔽aspiration,🔽interest,🔽equanimity,🔽attention,🔽attachment,🔽aversion,🔽delusion,🔽pride,🔽view,

original: shin tu sbyangs pa dang / 'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / btang snyoms dang / yid la byed pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / lta ba dang / rgod pa dang / the tshom dang /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa dang / 'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / btang snyoms dang / yid la byed pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / lta ba dang / rgod pa dang / the tshom dang /
translated: excitement,🔽doubt,🔽torpor,🔽shamelessness,🔽and lack of embarrassment.

original: rmugs pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa dang zhes de lta bu la sogs pa 'du byed mang po rnams la tshor ba dang 'du shes ma gtogs pa na 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: rmugs pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa dang zhes de lta bu la sogs pa 'du byed mang po rnams la tshor ba dang 'du shes ma gtogs pa na 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
translated: Except for feeling and discernment, many such formations are the formation aggregate.

original: rnam par shes pa ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni 'di ltar /
translated: Consciousness is as follows.

original: mig gi rnam shes dang / rna ba'i rnam shes dang / sna'i rnam shes dang / lce'i rnam shes dang / lus kyi rnam shes dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam shes dang / rna ba'i rnam shes dang / sna'i rnam shes dang / lce'i rnam shes dang / lus kyi rnam shes dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, the body consciousness, the mental faculty, and the mind consciousness.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
translated: This is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: yang phung po de rnams ni rgyu mtshan bzhis so sor tha dad par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang phung po de rnams ni rgyu mtshan bzhis so sor tha dad par shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, these aggregates should be understood as distinct from each other by means of four reasons.

original: 'di ltar / ngo bo'i don dang / mtshan nyid dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar / ngo bo'i don dang / mtshan nyid dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / bsdu ba'o //
translated: Namely, the meaning of essence, the meaning of characteristics, the meaning of classification, and the meaning of inclusion.

original: de la rten gyi don ni drug ste 'di ltar /
analyzed: de la rten gyi don ni drug ste 'di ltar /
translated: Among them, the meaning of basis is sixfold. Namely,

original: gzugs par bya ba'i don gyis gzugs dang / rig pa'i don gyis tshor ba dang / kun du shes pa'i don gyis 'du shes dang / so sor byed pa'i don gyis 'du byed dang / rnam par rtog pa'i don gyis rnam shes so //
analyzed: gzugs par bya ba'i don gyis gzugs dang / rig pa'i don gyis tshor ba dang / kun du shes pa'i don gyis 'du shes dang / so sor byed pa'i don gyis 'du byed dang / rnam par rtog pa'i don gyis rnam shes so //
translated: the meaning of form is that which can be broken, the meaning of feeling is experience, the meaning of perception is to apprehend, the meaning of formation is to form individually, and the meaning of consciousness is to be aware.

original: phung po zhes pa ni rigs mthun pa'i tshogs pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: phung po zhes pa ni rigs mthun pa'i tshogs pa'i don gyis so //
translated: The meaning of aggregate is the collection of things of the same type.

original: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid lnga ste 'di ltar /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid lnga ste 'di ltar /
translated: The characteristics are fivefold:

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs par bya ba ste /
translated: The characteristic of form is that it is suitable to be form.

original: bzos pa'i gzugs bzhin no //
analyzed: bzos pa'i gzugs bzhin no //
translated: It is like a created form.

original: gzugs de'i gzhi'i gnas ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o //
analyzed: gzugs de'i gzhi'i gnas ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o //
translated: The basis of the existence of that form is the four great elements.

original: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni so sor yang dag par rig pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni so sor yang dag par rig pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of feeling is the experience of pleasure and so on.

original: mdze rma'i za phrug ro myong bzhin no //
analyzed: mdze rma'i za phrug ro myong bzhin no //
translated: It is like the experience of the taste of a leper’s sores.

original: tshor ba de'i dngos po'i gnas ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba de'i dngos po'i gnas ni reg pa'o //
translated: The basis of the existence of that feeling is contact.

original: 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of discrimination is the apprehension of signs.

original: mngon par shes pa'i rgyu mtshan bzhin no //🔽'du shes de'i dngos po'i gnas ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i rgyu mtshan bzhin no // 'du shes de'i dngos po'i gnas ni reg pa'o //
translated: It is like the sign of clairvoyance.🔽The basis of the existence of that discrimination is contact.

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid ni 'du ba 'phen par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid ni 'du ba 'phen par byed pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of formation is the projection of the assembled.

original: 'khor lo 'phangs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'phangs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the projection of a wheel.

original: 'du byed de rnams kyi ngo bo'i gnas ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed de rnams kyi ngo bo'i gnas ni reg pa'o //
translated: The basis of the existence of those formations is contact.

original: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of consciousness is the discrimination of objects.

original: rnam par shes pa de'i skye ba'i gnas ni ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de'i skye ba'i gnas ni ming dang gzugs so //
translated: The place of birth of consciousness is name-and-form.

original: @183b rnam par shes pa ni phung po'i rnam par dbye ba ste /
analyzed: @183b rnam par shes pa ni phung po'i rnam par dbye ba ste /
translated: Consciousness is the division of the aggregates.

original: 'di ltar phung lnga dang / nye bar len pa'i phung lnga dang / chos kyi phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar phung lnga dang / nye bar len pa'i phung lnga dang / chos kyi phung po lnga'o //
translated: Thus, there are five aggregates, five appropriated aggregates, and five aggregates of Dharma.

original: de la phung po lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phung po lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five aggregates?

original: 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyang ngo //
translated: They are all conditioned dharmas.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five appropriated aggregates?

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyang ngo //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyang ngo //
translated: They are all dharmas with outflows.

original: chos kyi phung po lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos kyi phung po lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five aggregates of Dharma?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o //
translated: the aggregate of morality, the aggregate of concentration, the aggregate of wisdom, the aggregate of liberation, and the aggregate of the vision of the awareness of liberation.

original: skabs 'dir nye bar len pa'i phung po la mngon par 'dod do //
analyzed: skabs 'dir nye bar len pa'i phung po la mngon par 'dod do //
translated: In this context, the appropriated aggregates are intended.

original: bsdu ba ni sdud pa ste ;
analyzed: bsdu ba ni sdud pa ste ;
translated: The inclusion is the collection.

original: rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum ni 'di ltar /
translated: The three are as follows:

original: skye mched du bsdu ba dang / khams su bsdu ba dang / bden par bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: skye mched du bsdu ba dang / khams su bsdu ba dang / bden par bsdu ba'o //
translated: the inclusion in the sense bases, the inclusion in the elements, and the inclusion in the truths.

original: de la gzugs kyi phung po ni skye mched bcu gcig gis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de la gzugs kyi phung po ni skye mched bcu gcig gis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The form aggregate is included in eleven sense bases.

original: 'di ltar / gzugs kyi skye mched bcu dang / chos kyi skye mched gcig ste phyogs gcig gi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gzugs kyi skye mched bcu dang / chos kyi skye mched gcig ste phyogs gcig gi //
translated: Thus, ten sense bases of form and one sense base of mental objects, which is one part.

original: gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po gsum ni chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po gsum ni chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The three aggregates that are not form are included in the sense base of mental objects.

original: 'di ltar / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed do //
translated: Thus, feeling, perception, and mental formations.

original: gcig ni yid kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: gcig ni yid kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa ste /
translated: One is included in the sense base of the mental faculty.

original: 'di ltar / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
translated: Thus, the consciousness aggregate.

original: gzugs kyi phung po ni khams bcu gcig gis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po ni khams bcu gcig gis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The form aggregate is included in eleven elements.

original: gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po gsum ni chos kyi khams kyis bsdus pa'o //🔽rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni /
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po gsum ni chos kyi khams kyis bsdus pa'o // rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni /
translated: The three aggregates that are not form are included in the element of mental objects.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams bdun gyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams bdun gyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The consciousness aggregate is included in the seven consciousness elements.

original: tshul khrims dang ring nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang bzhi ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams kyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ring nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang bzhi ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams kyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The four aggregates of morality, concentration, wisdom, and the seeing of the knowledge of liberation are included in the sense-sphere of mental objects and the element of mental objects.

original: rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of liberation is included in the sense-sphere of mental objects, the element of mental objects, and the element of mental consciousness.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: The five aggregates of clinging are included in the truth of suffering.

original: nye bar len pa ni kun 'byung gi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa ni kun 'byung gi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: Clinging is included in the truth of the origin of suffering.

original: tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin shes rab kyi phung po gsum ni lam gyi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin shes rab kyi phung po gsum ni lam gyi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: The three aggregates of morality, concentration, and wisdom are included in the truth of the path.

original: rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni 'gog pa'i bden pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni 'gog pa'i bden pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of liberation is included in the truth of cessation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of the seeing of the knowledge of liberation is included in the truth of suffering.

original: de la phung pos bsdus shing bden pas @184a * //🔽bsdus pa ma yin pa'i chos yod do //
analyzed: de la phung pos bsdus shing bden pas @184a * // bsdus pa ma yin pa'i chos yod do //
translated: There is a phenomenon that is included in the aggregates but not included in the truths.

original: bden pas bsdus shing phung pos bsdus pa ma yin pa'i chos yod do //
analyzed: bden pas bsdus shing phung pos bsdus pa ma yin pa'i chos yod do //
translated: There is a phenomenon that is included in the truths but not included in the aggregates.

original: phung pos bsdus shing bden pas bsdus pa'i chos yod do //
analyzed: phung pos bsdus shing bden pas bsdus pa'i chos yod do //
translated: There is a phenomenon that is included in the aggregates and also included in the truths.

original: phung pos bsdus pa ma yin zhing bden pas bsdus pa ma yin pa'i chos yod do //
analyzed: phung pos bsdus pa ma yin zhing bden pas bsdus pa ma yin pa'i chos yod do //
translated: There is a phenomenon that is not included in the aggregates and not included in the truths.

original: de la dbang po ma yin pa dang 'brel ba'i gzugs dang / lam dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu chos ni phung pos bsdus shing bden pas bsdus pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la dbang po ma yin pa dang 'brel ba'i gzugs dang / lam dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu chos ni phung pos bsdus shing bden pas bsdus pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Form that is not related to the faculties, that which is concomitant with the path, and the phenomena that are the results of training are included in the aggregates but not included in the truths.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni bden pas bsdus shing phung pos bsdus pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni bden pas bsdus shing phung pos bsdus pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Nirvana is included in the truths but not included in the aggregates.

original: bden pa gsum ni phung pos bsdus shing bden pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa gsum ni phung pos bsdus shing bden pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: The three truths are included in the aggregates and also included in the truths.

original: btags yod ni phung pos bsdus pa ma yin zhing bden pas bsdus pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: btags yod ni phung pos bsdus pa ma yin zhing bden pas bsdus pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The imputedly existent is not included in the aggregates and is not included in the truths.

original: btags pa yang chos bcu gcig ste 'di ltar /
analyzed: btags pa yang chos bcu gcig ste 'di ltar /
translated: There are also eleven designations:

original: sems pa dang / phyogs dang / yul dang / dus dang / 'ongs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yan lag dang / zad par mtshan ma dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dmigs pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: sems pa dang / phyogs dang / yul dang / dus dang / 'ongs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yan lag dang / zad par mtshan ma dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dmigs pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: thought, direction, place, time, coming, the branch of purification, the sign of the totality of space, the meditative attainment of the base of nothingness, the meditative attainment of cessation,

original: yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / yang dag ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / yang dag ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: correct conception, and incorrect conception.

original: gang rnam pa de rnams kyi phung po la mkhas pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gang rnam pa de rnams kyi phung po la mkhas pa zhes brjod do //
translated: The aggregate of these aspects is called “the expertise in the aggregates.”

original: skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is expertise in the sense bases?

original: skye mched ni bcu gnyis te 'di ltar /
analyzed: skye mched ni bcu gnyis te 'di ltar /
translated: There are twelve sense bases:

original: mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang /
translated: the sense base of the eye, the sense base of form, the sense base of the ear, the sense base of sound, the sense base of the nose, the sense base of smell, the sense base of the tongue, the sense base of taste, the sense base of the body,

original: reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
analyzed: reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
translated: the sense-sphere of mental objects.

original: de la mig gi skye mched ni khams rab tu dang ba gang gis gzugs yongs su gcod pa'o //
analyzed: de la mig gi skye mched ni khams rab tu dang ba gang gis gzugs yongs su gcod pa'o //
translated: Among them, the sense-sphere of the eye is the clear element by means of which one perceives visible form.

original: gzugs kyi skye mched ni khams kyi kha dog gang mig gi spyod yul lo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye mched ni khams kyi kha dog gang mig gi spyod yul lo //
translated: The sense-sphere of visible form is the color of the elements that is the domain of the eye.

original: rna ba'i skye mched ni khams su rab tu dang ba gang gis sgra nyan pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i skye mched ni khams su rab tu dang ba gang gis sgra nyan pa'o //
translated: The sense-sphere of the ear is the clear element by means of which one hears sounds.

original: sgra'i skye mched ni khams kyi grag pa ste gang rna ba'i spyod yul de'o //🔽sna'i skye mched ni khams rab tu gsal pa gang gis dri snom pa'o //🔽dri'i skye mched ni gang sna'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: sgra'i skye mched ni khams kyi grag pa ste gang rna ba'i spyod yul de'o // sna'i skye mched ni khams rab tu gsal pa gang gis dri snom pa'o // dri'i skye mched ni gang sna'i spyod yul lo //
translated: The sense-sphere of sound is the sound of the elements that is the domain of the ear.🔽The sense-sphere of the nose is the clear element by means of which one smells odors.🔽The sense-sphere of odor is that which is the domain of the nose.

original: lce'i skye mched ni khams rab tu dang ba gang gis ro myong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i skye mched ni khams rab tu dang ba gang gis ro myong bar byed pa'o //
translated: The sense-sphere of the tongue is the clear element by means of which one tastes flavors.

original: ro'i skye mched ni khams kyi ro gang lce'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: ro'i skye mched ni khams kyi ro gang lce'i spyod yul lo //
translated: The sense-sphere of flavor is the flavor of the elements that is the domain of the tongue.

original: lus kyi skye mched ni khams @184b rab tu dang ba gang gis reg bya la reg pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi skye mched ni khams @184b rab tu dang ba gang gis reg bya la reg pa'o //
translated: The sense-sphere of the body is the clear-light element by which one experiences tangibility.

original: reg bya'i skye mched ni sa'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chu'i khams dang / sra ba dang / 'jam pa dang / dro ba dang / bsil ba ste /
analyzed: reg bya'i skye mched ni sa'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chu'i khams dang / sra ba dang / 'jam pa dang / dro ba dang / bsil ba ste /
translated: The sense-sphere of tangibility is the earth element, the fire element, the wind element, the water element, solidity, fluidity, heat, and motion,

original: gang lus kyi spyod yul lo //
analyzed: gang lus kyi spyod yul lo //
translated: which are the domain of the body.

original: yid kyi skye mched ni gang rnam par shes pa bdun gyi khams de'o //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched ni gang rnam par shes pa bdun gyi khams de'o //
translated: The sense-sphere of the mind is the element of consciousness, which is the seven consciousnesses.

original: chos kyi skye mched ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po gsum dang phra mo'i gzugs bcu dang mya ngan las 'das pa ste 'di ni skye mched bcu gnyis la sogs pa ste rgyas par ro //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po gsum dang phra mo'i gzugs bcu dang mya ngan las 'das pa ste 'di ni skye mched bcu gnyis la sogs pa ste rgyas par ro //
translated: The sense-sphere of mental objects is the three formless aggregates, the ten subtle forms, and nirvana.

original: gang rnam pa de rnams kyi skye mched la mkhas pa'i shes pa ni skye mched la mkhas pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gang rnam pa de rnams kyi skye mched la mkhas pa'i shes pa ni skye mched la mkhas pa zhes brjod do //
translated: The knowledge of the spheres which is the knowledge of these aspects is called the knowledge of the spheres.

original: khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of the elements?

original: khams bco brgyad de /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad de /
translated: There are eighteen elements:

original: 'di ltar / mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar / mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: Thus, the eye constituent, the form constituent, the eye-consciousness constituent, the ear constituent, the sound constituent, the ear-consciousness constituent, the nose constituent, the smell constituent, the nose-consciousness constituent,

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro //
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro //
translated: the tongue constituent, the taste constituent, the tongue-consciousness constituent, the body constituent, the tangible-object constituent, the body-consciousness constituent, the mind constituent, the entity constituent, the mind-consciousness constituent, and so on.

original: 'dir phung po dang / skye mched dang khams kyi sgo nas bstan pa na /
analyzed: 'dir phung po dang / skye mched dang khams kyi sgo nas bstan pa na /
translated: Here, when the aggregates, bases, and constituents are taught,

original: khyad par ci zhig bstan par gyur zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ci zhig bstan par gyur zhe na /
translated: what special point is taught?
